column1: Dumra is a town and a notified area in Sitamarhi district in Bihar
column2: India. Dumra is the headquarter of Sitamarhi district. It has approximately 16 wards.

column1: There is a small railway station situated in Dumra.
Dumra is located at 25.02°N 83.97°E﻿ / 25.02; 83.97. It has an average elevation of 86 metres (282 feet).

column3: 538. Males constitute 57% of the population and females 43%. Dumra has an average literacy rate of 77%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 80% and
column6: 11% of the population is under 6 years of age.
